title: Bug 13620: Java Source Attachment Preference Page has excessive white space
OB: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has a label positioned in the middle of the page, which results in a significant amount of white space. The vertical alignment of the label should be set to SWT.ALIGN_BEGINNING.
SR: 1) Load a project from the repository. 2) Select a source folder. 3) Open the Properties dialog. 4) Select Java Source Attachment. 5) [Provide further details]. Upon completing these steps, an information label will appear in the middle of the dialog.
